text: "Heavy Fuel" is a 1991 song by British rock band Dire Straits and is the second single from their sixth studio album On Every Street. It went to number 55 in the United Kingdom, number 34 in New Zealand, number 26 in Australia, number 48 in Germany, number 32 in France, number 17 in Canada and number 25 in the Netherlands. The music video features actor Randy Quaid. ==Track listings== #"Heavy Fuel" #"Planet of New Orleans" #"Kingdom Come" ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Dire Straits songs
title: Heavy Fuel
